description: This file defines a GlobalAudioManager class that manages HTML5 audio elements, ensuring only one plays at a time, with lazy loading and caching of audio assets via resolveForLesson. It provides methods for registering/unregistering audio elements, controlling playback, and resolving lesson-specific audio assets.

classes.name: GlobalAudioManager
classes.description: Manages audio elements to ensure only one plays at a time, with caching and lazy resolution of lesson audio assets.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers an audio element; if playNow is true, pauses others and plays this element.

methods.name: unregister
methods.description: Unregisters an audio element, removing event listeners.

methods.name: pauseAllExcept
methods.description: Pauses all registered audio elements except the specified one.

methods.name: resolveForLesson
methods.description: Resolves and caches audio and caption URLs for a given lesson, using lesson ID.
